name: Rumble Knights - idle RPG
description:
Aren't you guys tired of running?
Why don't you ride a horse as Rumble Knight?

One of the most popular idle action RPGs released this year!
Lets ride and run together!

[Multitude of supplies and riches for rapid growth!]
-Various rewards await your commander as you reach level 800!
-Be stronger than enemies you plunder!

[Create your troops! Win with strategy!]
-Create your own troops with 5 different kinds of unique species.
-Turn the table with strategic deployment!

[Lets ride and charge towards the battlefield!]
- Fast and dynamic battle!
-Explore the wonderous world of Rumble Knights!

[Easy and Fun! Unstoppable idle action RPG]
- Rumble knights are unstoppable even if you are having a break!
- Rumble knights get stronger day and night!
